scenarios.name: Create medical business
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_reception_uc9 name = MultiProviderMedical slug = multi-provider-med-uc9 status = active timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create main location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_uc9 biz_id = biz_reception_uc9 name = MedicalCenter slug = medical-center timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create doctor A user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_dr_a_uc9 email = dra.uc9@example.com name = DoctorA status = active

scenarios.name: Create doctor A resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_dr_a_uc9 biz_id = biz_reception_uc9 location_id = loc_uc9 type = host host_user_id = usr_dr_a_uc9 name = DoctorAResource slug = doctor-a-resource timezone = America/Los_Angeles capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false

scenarios.name: Create doctor A calendar
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendars id = cal_dr_a biz_id = biz_reception_uc9 name = DrASchedule timezone = America/Los_Angeles slot_duration_min = 30 slot_interval_min = 30 status = active

scenarios.name: Bind doctor A calendar
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendar_bindings id = cb_dr_a_uc9 biz_id = biz_reception_uc9 calendar_id = cal_dr_a owner_type = resource resource_id = res_dr_a_uc9 owner_ref_key = "resource:res_dr_a_uc9" is_primary = true is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create doctor B user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_dr_b_uc9 email = drb.uc9@example.com name = DoctorB status = active

scenarios.name: Create doctor B resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_dr_b_uc9 biz_id = biz_reception_uc9 location_id = loc_uc9 type = host host_user_id = usr_dr_b_uc9 name = DoctorBResource slug = doctor-b-resource timezone = America/Los_Angeles capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false

scenarios.name: Create doctor B calendar
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendars id = cal_dr_b biz_id = biz_reception_uc9 name = DrBSchedule timezone = America/Los_Angeles slot_duration_min = 30 slot_interval_min = 30 status = active

scenarios.name: Bind doctor B calendar
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendar_bindings id = cb_dr_b_uc9 biz_id = biz_reception_uc9 calendar_id = cal_dr_b owner_type = resource resource_id = res_dr_b_uc9 owner_ref_key = "resource:res_dr_b_uc9" is_primary = true is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create doctor C user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_dr_c_uc9 email = drc.uc9@example.com name = DoctorC status = active

scenarios.name: Create doctor C resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_dr_c_uc9 biz_id = biz_reception_uc9 location_id = loc_uc9 type = host host_user_id = usr_dr_c_uc9 name = DoctorCResource slug = doctor-c-resource timezone = America/Los_Angeles capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false

scenarios.name: Create doctor C calendar
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendars id = cal_dr_c biz_id = biz_reception_uc9 name = DrCSchedule timezone = America/Los_Angeles slot_duration_min = 30 slot_interval_min = 30 status = active

scenarios.name: Bind doctor C calendar
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendar_bindings id = cb_dr_c_uc9 biz_id = biz_reception_uc9 calendar_id = cal_dr_c owner_type = resource resource_id = res_dr_c_uc9 owner_ref_key = "resource:res_dr_c_uc9" is_primary = true is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create emergency overlay for Dr A
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendar_overlays id = cov_emergency_uc9 biz_id = biz_reception_uc9 calendar_id = cal_dr_a kind = emergency name = EmergencyEveningHours priority = 1 effective_start_at = 2026-02-22T18:00:00Z effective_end_at = 2026-02-22T20:00:00Z is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create overlay availability rule
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_override_uc9 biz_id = biz_reception_uc9 calendar_id = cal_dr_a overlay_id = cov_emergency_uc9 name = emergency_available mode = timestamp_range frequency = none start_at = 2026-02-22T18:00:00Z end_at = 2026-02-22T20:00:00Z action = available is_active = true priority = 1

scenarios.name: Query central doctor calendars
scenarios.prompt: list calendar_bindings where biz_id = biz_reception_uc9 and owner_type = resource limit 10
